Params: {3: 'You open your eyes to a world of freezing cold...'}
{3: 'The white vapor from your breath clouds the dark gray sky before you...'}
{3: 'Looking around, you see an endless sea of trees...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Based on the date, the position of the sun, and our records. Also, the unique signature found in this area...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Ionizing radiation from all the nuclear waste buried in the ground...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It seems that Watanabe has been rubbing off on you ever since you met him, hasn't he?", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "(Clears throat) Anyway, now that Babylonia has crossed path with the space station, reinforcements have to go a long way to get to you. They'll arrive in approximately fourteen hours...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "But now that you've entered the ARU... see if you can seek shelter with the survivors.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "The ARU... I heard they've isolated themselves ever since the Post-Pandemic Age...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Most of them even opposed the evacuation efforts. Only a small group of them has ended up in Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "It's just as you said. The ARU has been avoiding contact with Babylonia... But at least they aren't hostile.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'I suggest making your way north out of the coniferous forest to a base called New Murmansk.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'There you can meet up with the Support Force.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "The commandant's uniform was specially tailored for arctic climates at high altitudes. Thankfully, it will be of some use here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'That may be the case, but it will do little good against the radiation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's get the commandant out of this environment. One more thing, don't forget to take an anti-radiation pill.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Look at all the footprints. Most of them aren't ours.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Maybe they belong to the locals. Or... Corrupted...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "After all, we've been trudging through snow.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If we were to run into Corrupted like this...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't get careless. There may not be that many of them, but the terrain puts us at a disadvantage.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'An agile figure leaps out of the snow—'}
{3: 'Following that, a lance swings by and slices the Corrupted in two.'}
{3: 'More unfamiliar figures leap out of the forest and join the battle.'}
{3: 'By the time you can react, the nearby Corrupted have all fallen to the ground with a loud thud.'}
{3: 'Only after the others slowly approach and surround you all do you finally get a good look at your rescuers...'}
{3: 'Each one of them is slender and tall, having to look down at the bewildered outsiders even when standing a few feet away.'}
{3: 'Their mechanic frames are fully armed. You notice each of them wearing an assortment of sharp and angular-looking equipment.'}
{3: 'Each member has the upper body of a human accompanied by four horse-like legs.'}
{3: 'They seem accustomed to surprised looks from others. The leading centaur takes a stern step forward.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'We are the Forest Guards. We defend this territory from unwanted visitors.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The centaur brandishes its lance, stopping Liv in her tracks.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thank you for your assistance just now. We are the Gray Raven task force. We just crash-landed here, and now we need to travel north to New Murmansk.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "As I've said, outsiders are prohibited from entering without express permission! Otherwise...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just as the centaur raises her lance—'}
{3: 'A powerful voice comes out from within the depths of the forest.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Another tall figure slowly trudges through the snow with a lance.'}
{3: 'The white landscape offsets her inorganic profile, emanating indisputable authority.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Correct. I was the one who saved you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'How could you possibly... throw a lance into the low Earth orbit... from several kilometers away...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'So, Rosetta, you threw that lance because...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Well, it was just spur of the moment.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Our tradition dictates that these people should have died by your hand already, Diana.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'You were already uncertain about it. Do you still intend to fight them to the death?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Besides... Among all the Forest Guards, aren't you the one who is always the most excited to make contact with outsiders?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'All of a sudden, the crisp sound of laughter surrounds you all.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Diana, take them back to the camp.', 4: '1'}
